nasawebb1963605166105469248.content: No more hiding, I’ll be shining, like I’m born to be! Webb captured newborn stars glowing in the infrared within clouds of dust and gas (colored golden and orange in this image) in a star-forming region called Pismis 24. dir="ltr" href="https://t.co/Jnw5cbbiI0" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow" target="_blank" role="link" style="color: rgb(29, 155, 240);">go.nasa.gov/4p34sOl
